author: Flo
content: Oh, Wow! Your penchant for making Dutch angles really got to me in this image, lol! As my eyes started in upper left, I had the impression that you shot this from a balcony above one on which a gal was stretched out on a soft couch of some sort - then I noticed the rest of the image in lower right! Only then did I notice the letters and realize you'd tilted this quite a bit from the vertical. Even knowing all this, my brain still refuses to "set the scene straight" ðŸ™‚
